channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Roy Fielding, 8th December
item.description:
Village Way opposite Grafton Dance Centre under railway bridge on wall graffiti. The council worker said he could not see it. Please see the attached photo

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Village Way, Dulwich Village, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Ground power open, 8th December
item.description:

item.title: Streetlight still out, 8th December
item.description:
